item.description:
Age Regression Session

 

Have you ever wanted to relive an experience from an earlier age?  Can it be done????  Most certainly with hypnosis!  Our subconscious stores all the events that we experience throughout our lives.  With hypnosis, we can go back and experience them again.  Ever want to really experience the power of the mind....well this is definitely one powerful way to show just how powerful our minds are! 

We will have a regression experience that will take you back to a FUN and HAPPY TIME when you were alot younger.  Even if you dont think you had a happy childhood, there are times when you had happy times and your subconscious will find them for you to experience. 

People have asked is it really possible???  I have enjoyed regressing people back to remember these fun and happy experiences and would like to let the meetup group members experience it.  It will be amazing, fun and eye openning!  Not many people get to experience this in their lifetime! 

 

I FEEL YOUNGER ALREADY!
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs in the Story Hour Room

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Age Regression Session
